ARGUMENT
c

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scmatmat.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | scmatmat.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | scmatmat.s | |- S = ( N ScMat R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` A ) = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` A ) = ( .s ` A ) |
| 7 | 4, 1, 2, 5, 6, 3 | #P_scmatel | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( M e. S <-> ( M e. B /\ E. c e. ( Base ` R ) M = ( c ( .s ` A ) ( 1r ` A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( M e. B /\ E. c e. ( Base ` R ) M = ( c ( .s ` A ) ( 1r ` A ) ) ) -> M e. B ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl6bi | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( M e. S -> M e. B ) ) |
